Book List 2024

Posted on July 28, 2024

After my kindle decided to self-destroy all of my notes and books, I decided to keep the m here (maybe with notes included). List (2024):

  • Inside the black box - Rishi K. Narang
  • Deep Work - Cal Newport
  • Sapiens - Yuval Noah Harari
  • When Breath Becomes Air - Paul Kalanithi
  • A Wild Sheep Chase - Haruki Murakami
  • Kafka on the Shore - Haruki Murakami
  • The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle - Haruki Murakami
  • 1Q84 - Haruki Murakami
  • Men Without Women - Haruki Murakami
  • Norwegian Wood - Haruki Murakami
  • Ultra-Processed People - Chris van Tulleken

In progress 2024:

  • Masterminds of Programming - Federico Biancuzzi, Shane Warden
  • How to Be a Stoic - Massimo Pigliucci
  • Hacker’s Delight - Henry S. Warren Jr.
  • Functional Programming Simplified - Alvin Alexander
